articles.title: S. Side Urged to Receive NDC Inspection Group
articles.content:
S. Side Urged to Receive NDC Inspection Group
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is misleading the public opinion at home and abroad by asserting that the sinking of its warship "Cheonan" was caused by the DPRK's torpedo attack in a deliberate effort to link the case with it. In this connection the National Defence Commission of the DPRK clarified its principled stand that it would dispatch an inspection group to the spot in south Korea.
					According to it, the north side sent a notice to the south side, informing it that the DPRK would send the inspection group through the area under the joint control of the north and the south in the west coastal area at 10:00 on May 22 and urging the latter to take measures for its field activities including its passage through the Military Demarcation Line and guarantee of its safety.
					
					The group of traitors, however, sent a reply notice in which it said that it could not receive the inspection group of the north side, asserting that a scientific and objective investigation conducted by south Korean and foreign experts finally confirmed that the ship was sunken by the torpedo attack by the DPRK, this issue should be handled within the framework of the Armistice Agreement and that the north should just "take sincere approach" toward the issue upon receiving the results of the investigation, etc.
					
					A particular mention should be made of the fact that Kim Thae Yong, puppet minister of Defence, in a public appearance took issue with the DPRK's stand on dispatching the inspection group. He went the lengths of crying out for "appropriate compensation" and "resolute action", once again revealing his true colors as a wicked confrontation maniac and military gangster.
					
					It is a universally known fact that the issues related to the West Sea of Korea have been handled by the militaries of the north and the south.
					
					The U.S. administration, too, officially clarified in the past that the issue of the West Sea of Korea was not a matter to be governed by it. 
					
					This being a hard fact, the group of traitors turned down the proposal of the NDC of the DPRK for dispatching the inspection group under the pretext of the already defunct "Military Armistice Commission". This can not be construed otherwise than a move to prevent the true nature of its conspiratorial farce and charade from being brought to light.
					
					The minister of the People's Armed Forces of the NDC of the DPRK again sent the following notice to the south side on May 22 as the south side clarified its stand not to receive the inspection group of the NDC:
					
					The reply notice dated May 21 sent by the south side is nothing but a vicious provocation and shameless brigandish sophism once again hurling mud at the dignity of the DPRK.
					
					It was the south side that linked the case with the north from the very day it occurred and it was again the south side that finally declared confrontation with the north before and after the publication of a "report on the results of the joint investigation".
					
					It is the stand of the north side that there is no justification to plug such bogus mechanism as the "Military Armistice Commission" into the case as it was faked up by the south side to be an issue between the north and the south from its outset.
					
					The south side should take a due step for receiving the inspection group of the NDC of the DPRK as required by Paragraph 10 of Chapter 2 of the North-South Basic Agreement on Non-Aggression and Paragraph 8 of Chapter 2 of its appendix.
					
					There is no ground whatsoever for the south side to refuse to receive the inspection group of the NDC if the results of the investigation are objective and scientific as claimed by the south side. 
					
					The south side should immediately receive the inspection group as already clarified by the DPRK internally and externally and produce material evidence without a shred of doubt before it.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should unconditionally receive the inspection group and clarify the truth in the eyes of the world.

articles.title: CPRK Blasts S. Korea's Distribution of  "Education Information"
articles.content:
CPRK Blasts S. Korea's Distribution of  "Education Information"
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification massively issued various kinds of "education information" including what they called "2010 guidelines for education in unification" peppered with misinformation malignantly slandering and defiling the inviolable dignity and system of the DPRK and distributed them to schools at different levels and research institutions in south Korea. 
					The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Saturday in its information bulletin No. 954 said that this farce, an annual event of the puppet group, is nothing but a campaign to infuse the consciousness of confrontation into the minds of south Koreans in a systematic and coercive manner in a bid to quell their spirit of achieving reunification through an alliance with the north and incite hostility toward compatriots among youngsters and thus justify its moves against reunification and prolong its fascist dictatorial system.
					
					It is part of the group's cynical plot to tarnish the image of the DPRK at any cost, much upset by the might of the DPRK winning one victory after another, and fan up the atmosphere of confrontation with it with "the elections to the local self-governing bodies" at hand in a bid to mislead the public opinion, the information bulletin noted, and went on: 
					
					The reality once again patently proves that the puppet group is no more than warmongers who make no scruple of increasing the danger of war in order to realize its wild ambition to stay in power and a group of traitors opposed to reunification as they are unhesitatingly abusing even the education for the purpose of escalating confrontation with compatriots. 
					
					All Koreans in the north and the south and overseas should turn out as one in a nationwide struggle to make a clean sweep of the puppet group, bearing deep in mind that its rash acts are bound to bring discord among compatriots and a war disaster as it is a stumbling block lying in the way of national reconciliation, unity and peaceful reunification, urged the information bulletin.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Iran Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Iran Appointed
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Jo In Chol was appointed as the DPRK ambassador to Iran, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Gift from IUCN official
articles.content:
Gift from IUCN official
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift from Aban Marker Kabraji, director of the Asia Regional Office of the International Union for Conservation of Nature who is heading the visiting delegation of the office.
					 The director handed over the gift to an official concerned.

articles.title: Protection of Biodiversity Carried
articles.content:
Protection of Biodiversity Carried
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has directed a great effort to protecting biodiversity.
					 In recent years biodiversity has been seriously affected by the worldwide climatic change.
					
					 The DPRK Government has adopted laws and decisions for protecting forests, environment, aquatic resources and useful animals and preserved the country's natural resources through the month of aquatic resources protection, the tree-planting day and other mass campaigns for protecting and enlarging biodiversity.
					
					 A nationwide survey of wild animals has been carried on successfully in the country, involving experts and animal fanciers.
					
					 They are now conducting a survey of white-bellied black woodpecker, a bird rare in the world, in Rinsan, Phyongsan, Sohung and other areas, along with a project for securing its habits.
					
					 Meanwhile, various activities have been conducted to promote public understanding of biodiversity and plant trees in all parts of the country in a far-sighted way.
					
					 On the occasion of the World Day of Biological Diversity (May 22), Kim Sun Il, secretary general of the Central Committee of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea, told KCNA the DPRK Government would contribute to the effort of the international society to ensure biodiversity on the globe by protecting the ecological environment and increasing the animal and plant resources.

articles.title: Papers Greet Chongryon Congress
articles.content:
Papers Greet Chongryon Congress
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Saturday editorially greet the 22nd Congress of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) opening today.
					 The past three years since the 21st Congress of Chongryon were the fruitful days when officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan have dynamically spurred the triumphant advance of the patriotic cause while firmly defending their organization without the slightest hesitation and vacillation despite manifold difficulties and ordeals, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Chongryon has powerfully demonstrated the invincibility of the patriotic ranks, strengthening the unity and cohesion of the ranks in thinking and purpose and firmly protecting the interests of the compatriots even under the grave situation in which the anti-DPRK, anti-Chongryon moves have become more undisguised than ever before. This is the greatest success made in the period under review. 
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan have positively supported and defended the socialist homeland and made a great contribution to the drive to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					  Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan are at a crucial historic turning point. 
					
					 The movement of Koreans in Japan is sure to triumph as there are the great leader, the great homeland and Chongryon, a powerful Juche-based organization of overseas Koreans, and the indomitable mental power and inexhaustible strength of the compatriots rallied close around it.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the 22nd Congress of Chongryon will be brilliantly recorded in the history of the movement of Koreans in Japan as a congress of victors and unity thanks to the positive struggle of officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: US Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Blasted
articles.content:
US Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Blasted
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists' ever-more undisguised smear campaign against the DPRK to isolate and stifle it is no more than despicable behaviors of those seized by extreme uneasiness and fret about the tremendous power of the DPRK winning one victory after another, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 The U.S., aware that it can never bring the DPRK to its knees by force of arms as all its people are under arms and its whole territory has turned into a fortress, seeks to realize its ambition for aggression on the DPRK at any cost by employing all non-military means, the article observes, and goes on:
					
					 One of them is psychological warfare. 
					
					 This psychological warfare of the U.S. is aimed at creating illusion about capitalism, discontent with the socialist system, etc. among Korean people in a bid to realize its scenario to bring down the system in the DPRK with ease.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can bring down the DPRK through its despicable smear campaign.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' despicable and persistent psychological warfare to destabilize the DPRK, get it degenerate and bring it down will only harden the faith and will of the Korean people to firmly defend the country and socialism and consolidate the politico-ideological position and the anti-imperialist military front as firm as an invulnerable fortress.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to immediately stop its foolish anti-DPRK smear campaign.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising Marked in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising Marked in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The "event on the eve of the 30th anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising" took place in Kwangju of south Korea on May 17.
					It brought together more than 3,000 people including student delegates and members of civic and public organization across south Korea.
					
					 They recalled that the participants in the Kwangju resistance resolutely fought against the dictatorship of the fascist military forces, shouting slogans demanding independence, democracy and reunification three decades ago.
					
					 They declared that they would struggle for the democratization of the society and the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea by inheriting the spirit displayed at that time. 
					
					 A performance representing the participants in the Kwangju Popular Uprising was given at the event.

articles.title: Large-Scale Mobile Exercises to Be Kicked off in S. Korea
articles.content:
Large-Scale Mobile Exercises to Be Kicked off in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The 61st Division of the south Korean puppet army announced that it would stage large-scale mobile exercises in Inchon and the areas of Puchon, Kimpho, Phaju and Koyang of Kyonggi Province from May 24 to 28, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The warmongers are contemplating massively hurling troops and war hardware and even police and civilians into the projected saber-rattling, blustering that they are designed to "acquire the capability to carry out operations and get familiar with the procedures for performing duties" to cope with somebody's "intrusion".
					
					 The puppet warmongers are kicking up the racket of confrontation with the DPRK at an unprecedentedly reckless stage, driving the situation to the brink of a war.

articles.title: Chongryon Slashes S. Korean Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Chongryon Slashes S. Korean Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) released statements on May 19 in denunciation of the south Korean puppet authorities' evermore undisguised confrontation with the DPRK.  
					 Ri Han Su, chairman of the Association for the Peaceful Reunification of Korean Residents in Japan, deplored the miserable reality of south Korea in which the nation's landmark of reunification and the programme for putting it into practice are violated and only a whirlwind of confrontation holds sway. 
					
					 The association will boost solidarity and alliance with the north, the south and abroad in the idea of "By our nation itself" and thus make a tangible contribution to opening up a new phase of national reunification this year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, he stressed.
					
					 Pak Chang Gil, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, held that the group of traitors' acts of rushing headlong into confrontation and war, totally while crying out for "not ruling out a war" after totally freezing the inter-Korean relations are nothing but the deathbed frenzy of the maniacs to get out of a predicament. 
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon, chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan, declared that the union would never tolerate such treacherous and anti-reunification actions of the south Korean ruling forces as standing in the way of reconciliation, unity and cooperation between the north and the south.
					
					 Choe Song Yong, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, expressed the will to achieve the solidarity and alliance with all the youths and students at home and abroad to frustrate the treacherous, anti-reunification and undemocratic moves of the south Korean puppet conservative group and take the lead in ushering in a heyday of the movement for national unity and reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's China Visit Hailed by Italian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's China Visit Hailed by Italian Figure
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Flavio Pettinari, representative of the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and chief of the Fermo group for the study of the Juche idea, the Songun idea of Italy issued a statement on May 16 hailing General Secretary Kim Jong Il's successful visit to China. 
					 The statement noted that his visit to China provided an important occasion in re-confirming the will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Government of the DPRK to consolidate the friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries and ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of the region.
					
					 It expressed belief that if the two countries strengthen the cooperation on the basis of friendship and trust, they will achieve great success in the struggle to realize the denuclearization of the peninsula, the main issue in achieving the global peace and security.

articles.title: Kim Yong Chun demanda a la parte Sur aceptar al grupo de inspeccion
articles.content:
Kim Yong Chun demanda a la parte Sur aceptar al grupo de inspeccion
						
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak engana a la opinion publica nacional e internacional en el sentido de que la causa de hundimiento del barco "Cheonan" fuera el ataque de torpedero de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea al cabo de vincularla absurdamente con ese incidente, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC ha manifestado su posicion de principios de que enviaria al lugar de los hechos en el Sur de Corea su grupo de inspeccion. 
					  De acuerdo con ella, nuestra parte aviso a la parte Sur que enviaria a las 10 del dia 22 nuestro grupo de inspeccion por via de la zona de administracion conjunta Norte-Sur en la region costera del Mar Oeste, demandando tomar medidas para garantizar las actividades del grupo en el lugar de los hechos, incluyendo el paso por la linea de demarcacion militar y la seguridad personal de sus miembros.
					
					  Pero, la horda de los traidores surcoreanos nos envio la respuesta de no aceptar al grupo de inspeccion aduciendo que el hundimiento del barco "Cheonan" por el ataque de torpedo del Norte fue comprobado definitivamente en la investigacion cientifica y objetiva de los especialistas nacionales y extranjeros, hay que tratar este tema en el marco del Acuerdo de Armisticio y el Norte solo tiene que informarse de su resultado y "aceptarlo con sinceridad".
					
					  Especialmente, el ministro titere de Defensa Nacional, Kim Thae Yong, calumnio en publico nuestra posicion sobre el envio del grupo de inspeccion y volvio a mostrar su naturaleza de connotado maniaco de enfrentamiento y gangster del circulo militar hablando del "precio merecido" y "accion rotunda".
					
					  Todo el mundo sabe que hasta la fecha, los circulos militares del Norte y el Sur han venido tratando directamente los problemas surgidos en las aguas del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					
					  Hasta la administracion norteamericana habia anunciado una vez de manera oficial que el problema del Mar Oeste de Corea no era un asunto bajo su facultad.
					
					    Sin embargo, la banda de traidores se nego a aceptar al grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC justificandose con la  ya desaparecida "Comision Militar de Armisticio" con el fin de cerrar de antemano las posibilidades de desenmascarar su farsa y complot. 
					
					  Con respecto a que la banda de traidores nos notifico su posicion de no aceptar al grupo de inspeccion, el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares del CDN de la RPDC envio el dia 22 otro aviso que sigue:
					
					  El aviso de respuesta de la parte Sur, fechado 21 de mayo, es otra provocacion malsana y sofisteria de bandido que vuelve a desvirtuar nuestra dignidad.
					
					  Es precisamente la parte Sur que desde el principio del estallido del incidente lo vinculo con la RPDC y anuncio oficialmente la confrontacion con esta antes y despues de la "publicacion del resultado de investigacion conjunta".
					
					  Nuestra posicion consiste en que no hay ninguna razon de involucrar en ese caso al aparato fantasmal llamada "Comision Militar de Armisticio", dado que el caso fue manipulado desde el principio por la parte Sur como un problema entre el Norte y el Sur. 
					
					  Tanto en vista del articulo 10 del capitulo 2 del Acuerdo Basico Norte-Sur de la No Agresion como a la luz del articulo 8 del capitulo 2 de su anexo, la parte Sur tiene la obligacion de tomar la medida de aceptar al grupo de inspeccion del CDN.
					
					  En particular, si fuera objetivo y cientifico el resultado de investigacion como insiste la parte Sur, no habria ninguna razon que impida aceptarlo. 
					
					  Como ya hemos aclarado al interior y al exterior del pais, la parte Sur debe aceptar inmediatamente al grupo de inspeccion del CDN y presentar ante el la prueba material que no fuera sospechosa en lo minimo. 
					
					  La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak debe aclarar la verdad a la vista del mundo al aceptar incondicionalmente al grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC.

articles.title: CRPP condena al Ministerio titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP condena al Ministerio titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el Ministerio titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea publico en gran cantidad distintos "datos de educacion" incluso la "guia de educacion de reunificacion para 2010", que censuran e insultan cruelmente la sagrada dignidad y sistema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y los distribuyo a las entidades de estudio y las escuelas a todos niveles. 
					Esta farsa, que libra cada ano la banda de titeres, deviene una maniobra sistematica y coercitiva para exterminar el ambiente pro-norcoreano por la reunificacion de la poblacion surcoreana, inculcar la conciencia de confrontacion fratricida a los integrantes de nueva generacion y, a la larga, para justificar sus maquinaciones anti-reunificacion y prolongar de continuo su sistema de dictadura fascista. 
					
					Senalo asi el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) en su informacion No. 954 publicada el dia 22 y continuo:
					
					Ademas, es un eslabon de la artimana de los atemorizados por el poderio de la RPDC que avanza a pasos firmes, tendentes a manchar a toda costa la imagen de esta y desviar la opinion publica creando el ambiente fanatico contra ella en visperas de las "elecciones de autonomia local". 
					
					  La realidad muestra una vez mas claramente que los titeres surcoreanos son belicistas que cometen sin escrupulos los crimenes de agravacion del peligro de la guerra para satisfacer su ambicion de tomar el poder y son traidores anti-reunificacion que para la confrontacion fratricida abusan sin titubeo de hasta la educacion. 
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben tener presente que mientras que actuan con petulancia los traidores, estorbos de la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y de la reunificacion pacifica, solo engendraran la discordia nacional y el desastre de la guerra, y levantarse como un solo hombre en la lucha pannacional por aniquilar a la banda de traidores.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. en caso de buque hundido
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza acusacion de EE.UU. en caso de buque hundido
						
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por el incidente de hundimiento de un buque de guerra surcoreano, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC publico el dia 21 una declaracion que sigue:
					EE.UU. acuso a nuestro pais en el caso de hundimiento de un buque de guerra surcoreano diciendo que esto ocurrio por el "ataque del Norte de Corea" y deviene un "desafio a la paz y la seguridad internacionales".
					
					Estos dichos muestran su intencion de acrecentar el clima de presion internacional contra la RPDC defendiendo a la camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea.
					
					Esto demuestra que EE.UU. persigue invariablemente su politica hostil para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					Como ya hemos declarado, no tenemos nada que ver con el hundimiento del buque del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Tal criterio de EE.UU. resulta la logica de bandido para la RPDC que viene observando siempre el derecho internacional.
					
					El surgimiento y el "resultado de investigacion" del caso son de punta a cabo un invento hecho con la aprobacion, el amparo y la instigacion de EE.UU.
					
					Si bien hablaba aparentemente de la "investigacion cientifica y objetiva", EE.UU. califico desde el principio a la RPDC de "sospechosa" aun antes de que se sacara el resultado diciendo que "casi no hoy otro sospechoso excepto al Norte de Corea" y "es muy probable que la causa del hundimiento este en el ataque del torpedo norcoreano", y oriento la investigacion en este sentido.
					
					Al pensar equivocadamente que nuestro pais se arrodillaria ante la sancion, EE.UU. habia eludido el dialogo y negociaciones bajo el rotulo de "paciencia estrategica".
					
					La RPDC y EE.UU. estaban en negociaciones para sostener en Nueva York otras conversaciones luego del dialogo bilateral efectuado en Pyongyang en diciembre de 2009. Esto formaba parte de los esfuerzos por recuperar definitivamente el marco de las conversaciones a 6 bandas segun la propuesta de tercera fase de China, pais presidente de estas negociaciones.
					
					Pero, la administracion Obama del partido democratico, que perdio ante el partido republicano en las elecciones suplementarias del senado efectuadas en enero de este ano siendo evaluada como debil en la politica exterior, se volvio a la intransigencia e interrumpio totalmente el proceso de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana bajo el solo pretexto del hundimiento de buque surcoreano.
					
					La actual administracion norteamericana piensa internacionalizar la sancion con el fin de sofocar a nuestro pais en lo politico y economico y usar al Sur de Corea como lacayo en el cumplimiento de su estrategia sobre Asia.
					
					Pero, EE.UU. debe saber que no le sera tan facil enganar al mundo.
					
					Todo el mundo guarda fresca en su memoria la imagen altanera y "persuasiva" del ex secretario norteamericano de Estado Powell cuando el enumeraba durante nada menos 70 minutos en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU las "informaciones supersecretas" sobre la existencia en Irak de las armas de exterminio masivo.
					
					Con esta mentira secular, EE.UU. justifico su invasion armada a Irak y no se libra todavia de sus vergonzosas consecuencias.
					
					Si EE.UU. vuelve a embustear en la Peninsula Coreana y sus "perros mimados" agravan la situacion siguiendo a ciegas a aquel, ellos deberan pagar un costo incomparable con lo que han pagado en la guerra iraqui.
					
					Aunque EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites esperen mucho, veran solo la realidad de la Corea socialista en prosperidad, al contrario de lo que estan sonando.
					
					Realizar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y defender la estabilidad y la paz de la region es nuestra invariable politica. Pero, no permitiremos ni en lo minimo los atentados contra la soberania y el derecho a la existencia de nuestro pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia guerra psicologica anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia guerra psicologica anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ATCC) -- Ahora, los imperialistas yanquis endurecen su sucia campana intrigante encaminada a aislar y aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Esto no pasa de ser una conducta ridicula de los que se sienten muy inquietados e impacientes ante el colosal poderio nacional de la RPDC que avanza con pasos cada dia mas firmes y victoriosos.
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este sabado y continua:
					
					  Percatado de que no puede doblegar nunca por via militar a la RPDC en que todo el pueblo esta armado y todo el pais esta fortificado, EE.UU. intenta realizar a toda costa su ambicion de agredirla usando todas las opciones no militares.
					
					  Una de ellas es la guerra psicologica, detras de la cual subyace el objetivo de EE.UU. de derrocar facilmente el regimen de la RPDC al infundir en el pueblo coreano la ilusion sobre el capitalismo y fomentar el descontento popular del sistema socialista.
					
					  Es una gran equivocacion y tonteria el intento del imperio de atentar a la RPDC con esa sucia campana intrigante.
					
					  Mientras los yanquis sigan recurriendo a esa sucia guerra psicologica orientada a desestabilizar y descomponer desde adentro a la RPDC, seran mil veces mas firmes la conviccion y voluntad del pueblo coreano de defender firmemente la patria y el socialismo y se consolidaran como baluarte inexpugnable el frente politico-ideologico y el militar antiimperialista.
					
					  EE.UU. debe parar ahora mismo su inutil campana psicologica contra la RPDC.
